DOC.brief_summary: The scientific literature show quantitative relationship diet combined physical activity long term weight reduction modality important factor weight maintenance . Primary assumption - 14/21 diet impact BMI value , long-term maintenance . Secondary assumption - 14/21 diet positive impact anthropomorphic biochemical marker , blood pressure , rest heart rate , RMR , life quality .
DOC.detailed_description: An interventional part duration 56 day follow-up period include monitor different parameter . Follow session set 3 , 6 , 12 24 month end interventional period . Participants recruit several round , include 25 participant . Diet program divide 3 period : 1 . Low carb diet 14 day ; 2 . Low carb regular diet alternate day 21 day ; 3 . Individual carbohydrate-rich diet 21 day . The diet consist free choice food ingredient detailed list food category ( protein , carbohydrate , vegetable , fat etc. ) . The participant free choose type food long within specify allowance ( quantity ) food group.During intervention period subject meet walking . In addition , 30 minute aerobic exercise recommend 3 times/week .
DOC.criteria: Hebrew speak 25 < BMI < 30 18 year old old sign informed consent Subjects physical disability prevent exercise , Subjects pregnant lactating , Subjects currently involve another lifestyle intervention program , Subjects undergone bariatric surgery past , Subjects : cancer , liver/kidney disease , organ transplantation , alcohol/drug addiction , Subjects cognitive deterioration psychosis , vegetarian does't eat fish/sea food vegan
